item.description:
September 17, 2009- Monthly Meeting
Doug Fath

Want to get 2-3x your normal rent for the same property?
Cash in on college rentals!

Recession proof your real estate business with student housing. Discover how to:

Take advantage of the billions of dollars that have been lost in the real estate market
Achieve financial freedom quickly and safely
Secure financing and raise money
Guarantee your tenants pay you every single dollar of rent
Phrase the top 5 clauses you must have in your lease

5:30 - 6:15 PM - POWER HOUR - Networking - members only

6:30 PM - Meeting

Location: Best Western, 380 Winter Street, Waltham, MA

Free to members, Visitors and meetup members only $25 at the door.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association September Meetup
